message: Good morning James. This is a reminder about your upcoming court date on February 15th at 9:00 AM. Please confirm receipt.
Kailani, your payment has been received and processed. Thank you for staying current with your obligations.
Robert, you have missed your last two check-ins. Please contact our office immediately at (808) 555-BAIL.
Hi, I received the court reminder. I will be there on time. Thank you.
Ana, welcome to our system. Please remember to check in weekly and keep us updated with any address changes.
